QuestData.Title: Let the Baron Know
QuestData.Description: The most important thing that you can do right now is to return to The Shadow Vault and let Baron Sliver know that I've failed.$B$BYou see, I wasn't the only one captured by these vrykul devils. My entire contingent of death knights was also taken.$B$BI should have seen the trap before it was sprung, but there's no use crying over spilled milk now is there?$B$BGo on before you get captured, too! I'll see you back at the vault.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Baron Sliver at The Shadow Vault.
QuestData.RewardText: What?! We can ill-afford to lose one death knight, let alone an entire contingent!!!
